article_title: US health system fares poorly in comparison with others.

og.description: The latest Commonwealth Fund report, 'Mirror, mirror on the wall: how the U.S. health care system compares internationally' compares the US health care system against ten other countries. The USA comes off badly, but the data is pre-Obamacare. The 11 coun
